value.title: IF EAGER DAX function in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this session, we will try to explore one more important DAX function in Power BI. We all aware about IF Expression in Power BI. But what about IF.EAGER Dax function? value.title: Avoid Left Outer Joins with DirectQuery in Power BI
value.excerpt: By default, your DirectQuery queries, in Power BI, will send a LEFT OUTER JOIN and could make your DBA not happy! Patrick shows you how you can change this to an INNER JOIN and put your DBA back into that happy space.  üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want
